website_summaries.verdict: Not just for shopping: made from heavy gauge steel, this highly-rated cart holds up to a whopping 250 lbs. and has a multitude of uses.
pros: Easy to assemble when directions are followed
Folds down and stores flat when not needed
Consumers report that the cart will last for years if used correctly
Can load several bags into the cart, allowing the reduction of trips from car to house
cons: Front wheels only go straight ahead instead of swiveling
Runs a bit heavier than some other carts
Some users report problems with bent cotter pins

customer_reviews.title: I hate this cart
customer_reviews.text: Awful. I ordered this cart; it arrived without the hardware pack, so yeah...no way to assemble it. Got a replacement. SAME THING. It's not as if these things are a walk in the park to return. I'm incredibly angry and frustrated, and as this was th one thing my father wanted for his birthday, I have to try again to deal with this nonsense. I HATE THIS CART.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine J. Beltrami

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cart.
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday. The cart is large but easy to assemble. I was searching for a cart I could use for transporting groceries from my truck to my house while dealing with a toddler. This cart sill work nicely. I only gave 4 stars because I had been planning to keep the cart folded into a corner inside out of the weather etc. I can't do that though because it has the STRONGEST chemical smell I have ever smelled. It's terrible. If you can keep it outdoors or inside of a garage it would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S Black

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy fitting on otherwise satisfactory cart
customer_reviews.text: i have ordered two of these previously without any problems. Although this one assembled quickly, one of the rear wheels fell off on first use. The problem is the flimsy cotter pins. They are much too fragile for a cart of this size. I can fix the problem by purchasing more durable cotter pins at the hardware store, but I shouldn't have to do that, in my opinion. The wheel quality is fine. Other people have reported receiving cheap wheels. These were quite sturdy. The blue color is not the powder blue pictured. it's much more intense, and not that attractive to me. However, I bought this for it's supposed utility, not for fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie94

customer_reviews.title: Missing 3 parts and bent DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Cart came missing a wheel and both axles. There was no box in the cart was wraps pathway with Claire plastic tape that was hard to get off. Horrible purchase and a waste of money. Amazon needs to avoid them like the plague. Extremely unhappy. I was planning on using this for my black Friday shopping. Now I had to get out tonight and spend more money to get a cart that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Oyler

customer_reviews.title: Handi Kart
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about eight months. ONLY drawback is that it does not have front swivel wheels. You have to pretty much mandhandle it to turn it with heavy load. It states a 250 pound capacity. Daily use for laundry, groceries, etc work fine. Handle is wrapped in foam rubber and comfortable to grip. Bottom plate very good for stopping items from falling through (also good for writing your initials in felt pen on the bottom). Mostly it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BOSORT

customer_reviews.title: It Holds Everything!
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved to an apartment where we park our car across the street in a garage. The shopping cart has saved us many trips back and forth. It has held four large shopping bags plus a large pack of paper towels in one trip and also many other assorted and odd-shaped items we took to our storage unit on another floor. While it's not as light as some others, it is quite sturdy and can hold your heaviest objects. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Woman

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and useful.
customer_reviews.text: A life saver for those of us with bad backs who have to get groceries from the parking garage to our apartments. I only wish someone would come up with a way to design one so I wouldn't have to bend so far to lift bags out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebreezy

customer_reviews.title: It's GREAT! So glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have a habit of putting grocery shopping off until I'm about out if everything so needless to say when I do go I end up with having to buy quite alot which makes for alot of heavy carrying. This cart makes it so much easier. It's GREAT! So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: tenyb

customer_reviews.title: Works well, needs assembly, fair price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, needs assembly, fair price. Sturdy shopping cart. Lives up to ad description. Yes I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 4 story apartment complex and used to use the large [...] shoulder bags to carry my groceries, etc. up to the 4th floor. After noticing increased shoulder, neck, and back pain I found this shopping cart and it has been a life saver. I don't understand why other reviews have said it's hard to steer. If you tilt it on the back two wheels, it steers perfect by pushing it or pulling it. It folds up really easy and unfolds super fast. Very lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: Sachico88

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for apartment living.
customer_reviews.text: The only change I would make, if I could, would be swivel wheels in the front, to make steering a bit easier. Other than that, it is fine. It seems sturdy and, coupled with the liner I purchased, it is very helpful for apartment living (laundry, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: does the trick
customer_reviews.text: This cart is big. It holds five or six cloth bags of groceries so fewer trips from the car to the kitchen. It is sturdy and the rolls easily. It folds up easily and takes up little space when not in use. Because of its size it is a bit difficult getting in and out of the front door/storm door combo.
customer_reviews.author: bandit

customer_reviews.title: There was a piece missing in the box. One ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a piece missing in the box. One of the axle rods. Had to fabricate my own rather than go through the hassle of a return.
customer_reviews.author: Alex T. Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Grocery Cart
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother - she's 85 yrs old and even tho she gets around good, she can't carry a lot of groceries in from the car by herself but this makes it easier because she can put EVERYTHING in it and make 1 trip. She also still sells avon and her Avon boxes fit perfect in it. I also purchased the the inside liner for it. The only thing I see that could be a problem is that you will need a closet to store it in because the wheels won't fit under a bed. It does fold up and has a locking position. It's pretty sturdy - holds up to 250 lbs (so it says)
customer_reviews.author: J. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: picture is misleading, parts missing
customer_reviews.text: The one that was mailed to me was not the one pictured (different, less sturdy wheels). The bag containing parts was ripped and parts were missing. The instruction sheet was stained and wrinkled. Scrapped in some parts at the bottom. The company was defensive when I contacted about these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Solange Margery

customer_reviews.title: Great, solid cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid cart. I can only surmise that the previous reviewer who stated that their cart "falled" apart did not bend the two sides of the cotter pins in different directions. It's a nice cart and with about 20 minutes of assembly I went right to market and carried home a case of soda and a large amount of groceries. The only thing that might be a problem is that this cart is wide and the wheels hang outside the width of the cart so that it tends to hang in doorways.
customer_reviews.author: Arbitrary Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Horrid
customer_reviews.text: Parts missing when rec'd 10/24/07. Called 10/25/07, spoke to Janet, she said washers would be mailed, should receive in 5 days. Still waiting. On 11/08/07 I spoke to Jennifer, she said she would check and call me the next day, still haven't heard from her. On 11/13/07 I e-mailed company & haven't rec'd a reply. Calling on the phone is terrible, put on hold, then disconnected. Rita Kozlowski 11/16/07 Anyone thinking of ordering should be forewarned. I really want to give 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kozlowski

customer_reviews.title: Super Shopping Cart
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found this earlier as I picked up one of those garden carriers and was way too small. This does the trick to all my needs as I have back problems and this cart helps me to bring things into my home easier. I give it a high 5 and would recommend it to other shoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Christian Reader

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Covers the floor space of the small grocery carts. Harder to turn in the store because the front wheels don't pivot, but that is minor. Wheels are sturdy and on a sturdy axle. I am weak in the arms/hands due to surgery, and this was well within my capability without the hammer/pliers suggested.
customer_reviews.author: CamiK

customer_reviews.title: larger then expected
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a cart like this and wanted another. This one is much bigger then my old one so I don't keep it in the car.. so I haven't used it as much as my old one, but if I had a lot of groceries then this would work too.
customer_reviews.author: smallred2

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LOVE THIS CART. BEST CART I EVER HAD. I LIKE THE LARGE BACK WHEELS. IT GOES UP AND DOWN THE STAIRS GREAT, EVEN THE BASEMENT STAIRS THAT HAVE NO BACKS. I USE IT TO SHOP AND FOR MY LAUNDRY. I'M ABLE TO MOVE IT IN AND OUT OF MY APARTMENT WITHOUT BRUSHING AGAINST MY FURNITURE LIKE MY OLD CART USED TO. IT'S MORE COMPACT THAN MY OTHER CART, YET STRONG ENOUGH FOR LARGE LOADS. WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: This cart is great. I love the large size
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great. I love the large size. I am tall (5'10") and the push handle is adequate so I don't have to bend over as I am walking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K. Altork

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the white cart. Received a blue one. Disappointing. Be prepared to receive a cart that is not the color you select. On the upside, this cart is durable. I have been using it for the past 1.5 years on my weekly grocery runs and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jojanna

customer_reviews.title: shopping cart
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a distance between my car and my front door.... now I can take everything from car to door! It sure beats taking 5 trips or more. The only difference I would make is to be able to lock the cart to keep it from moving while it's folded. But I can deal with that. It's a good size and moves very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Frailing

customer_reviews.title: Cart Good, Wheels Bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the cart, its sturdy and spacious, but my back wheel broke on the 2nd use. I bought some steel hubed wheels at the hardware store, and now its a good cart again. So, factor in the price of two good wheels (about $10 each) when considering this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Williams

customer_reviews.title: does job
customer_reviews.text: It does what its supposed to do. I use it to cart groceries. It came very poorly packaged and actually had rust on.it. bit, its to be expected being a foreign product costing so little. It will hold 50 lbs easy though. Don't expect it to last too long. But, if I get a year out of it, I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: john522

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, FOLLOW directions when assembling and don't overload
customer_reviews.text: Actually well constructed and functional 'Bit 'O kit.' Folds up easily, rolls fine as long as you limit the amount you put in same. I'd have to guess, but keep your load to 30# or less if you have any major 'walking' back from the store. fae
customer_reviews.author: fredaevans

customer_reviews.title: needs better clamp to stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: like it but the clamp that holds the front and back when folding doesn't work for crapola.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large enough and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The cart is perfect for carting groceries from the car to the elevator. It only takes one trip since the cart is large enough to hold the bags. It rolls smoothly and handles well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the price. Very hard to pull up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: dsullivan

customer_reviews.title: Huge cart with solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Just put this puppy together. Pretty easy if you follow the instructions. Rather large, but that's what I needed. I don't anticipate any problems with it -- except for finding a place to store it when it's not in my car. It's large.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy C

customer_reviews.title: This item works
customer_reviews.text: This item works but is not very heavy. It is cheaply made and the directions are not all that accurate. It will get you by for a while.
customer_reviews.author: CLEANING MACHINE

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I Gave this as a gift and so far it's holding up well.It gets lots of use hauling groceries and laundry.
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: foldable shopping cart
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the shopping cart. It is very stable and handles a lot of bags of groceries. The photo appears to have a bag insert, but we did not receive one. I imagine we will find other uses for it too! Boop
customer_reviews.author: Betty Pinchefsky

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Works well on shopping trips in the Big Apple. Hauls kitty litter through the subway like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Was needed.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job for carrying groceries up a flight of stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Mercado Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cart
customer_reviews.text: makes going to the store easy and simple and easy to push. The assembling was easy and it holds up a pretty decent amount of groceries or Laundry.
customer_reviews.author: TashaColeman75

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart for a trip to the shore. We were looking for something to lug all the beach stuff in everyday. I was a little leary because other reviewers wrote about the wheels falling off. I tried to replace the cotter pins before there was problem but I bought the wrong size. We never had a problem, but I will still replace the cotter pins. For the money and because it says it will hold 250 lbs it should come with thicker cotter pins.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa J. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Rose
customer_reviews.text: The large size is helpful for stocking up at the store. If there is too much weight in the cart,it becomes impossible to move. The front wheels do not turn or steer which would have made this product perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: I walk to work and have used this every day to cart my supplies during the terrible weather this winter (2013-14). It has held up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: BASTANTE AMPLIO,  DEMACIADO ANCHO.  OK.
customer_reviews.text: COMPRE UNO HACE AÑO Y MEDIO. ESE ME DURO UN AÑO Y SE QUEBRO. COMPRE EL SEGUNDO EN EL MISMO LUGAR. EXACTAMENTE IGUAL. Y ESE DURO 15 DIAS. SOLO LO USE 2 VECES Y SE QUEBRO DEL TUBO DE LA PARTE DE LAS LLANTAS. ESTA MUY AMPLIO, PERO DEBERIAN DE MEJORAR LA CALIDAD DEL MATERIAL DE PRODUCCION. SERIA EL TAMAÑO PERFECTO. OJALA QUE LOS FABRICADORES INVIERTAN UN POCO MAS EN LA CALIDAD DEL PRODUCTO, AUNQUE LO VENDIERAN MAS CARO.
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA V.

customer_reviews.title: Super Shopping Cart
customer_reviews.text: It would have been perfect if the front wheels were able to turn more freely. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deloris Jackson Turner

customer_reviews.title: Needs Better Front Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Needs swivel front wheels to make turning easier. Otherwise a good product
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth K Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Grocery cart
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cart. It is strong, easy to assemble and carries quite a bit more than the smaller ones. Good price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett J. Finneran

customer_reviews.title: wrong color
customer_reviews.text: it works really well...it does what it is expected to do..except it was not red in color it was maroon
customer_reviews.author: judith ann mcmannis

customer_reviews.title: Front wheels are the worst
customer_reviews.text: The front wheels do not move! This would be fine if you walk forward and backward but unfortunately the real world requires turning. In order to turn you must lift the front of the cart and turn! How can they manufacture a shopping cart without the ability to turn? I will try and find replacement wheels or just return this unit.
customer_reviews.author: JoeD

customer_reviews.title: Sent this right back
customer_reviews.text: The odor from the plastic wheels was so intense. Yuck. Hoped it would air out after some time but did not.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Just OK, expected better quality. Low quality wheels, lousy assembly instructions. Confusing assembly.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: A good cart
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Super shopping cart I purchased,I gave them as gifts and everyone is surprised that in can hold a lot of stuff and it can hold up to 250lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Doorhy

customer_reviews.title: Great and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is the lexus of shopping carts. The wheels are solid rubber, the metal is coated with white to prevent rust and there is a metal plate in the bottom to keep things from falling out the bottom. The plate also save your having to purchase a lining for your cart. I can't imagine buying so many groceries that you couldn't get them all in. I love mine and I have seen a lot of flimsy ones to compare it to. I can't suggest another that would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Angelthreads

customer_reviews.title: Big Help in My Life
customer_reviews.text: I got it assembled in about 45 minutes, would have been less if I had more recent practice using pliers. This is my second cart like this, the first one lasted a good long while for groceries and laundry. Mine was well packed. No complaints except maybe the print on the instruction sheet could've been a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: LSF

customer_reviews.title: Great cart - Arrived damaged a little
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a replacement for the one that was getting ready to give out after 3 years of abuse. so it was way after the return window when we opened the cart to assemble it, back axel was slightly bent. Nothing a hammer and sidewalk could not fix though. Great cart though we often bring in more than 170 lbs of groceries, my o2 tanks, and anything else we come up with.
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey Henderson

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: When my cart arrived the box had holes in it which caused me to worry, but when I opened it everything was fine. Everything was in the packaging that I needed including the directions. I put it together by myself with very few problems. the directions said that I would need pliers and a hammer, but I didn't need either. I'm very slow so it took me about an hour to put it together. I haven't tried it yet but it appears to be very sturdy. I did a lot of research and I'm happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: toy Lavendel

customer_reviews.title: Shopping Cart
customer_reviews.text: When I lived in San Francisco, I had a cart similar to this and used it almost daily for shopping and carting my laundry to the laundromat. After several years of draggin it up & down HILLS, it finally gave up and I have been looking for another one. I am now handicapped and have been looking for another cart. The size of the Narita Cart is large & study with large solid rubber wheels. I use it to bring groceries in from my car and take heavy items out that I cannot carry. The price is excellent! I would definitely reorder if it becomes necessary. It collapses and is easily stored.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Stark

customer_reviews.title: Shop Til You Drop
customer_reviews.text: One of the things about living in Mexico is there are little "tiendas" (small grocery stores) nearby to buy milk, fruit and vegetables. With this cart I walk to the tienda, do my shopping and roll home. So many people have asked me where I got it from. There is a cart liner that goes with it which fits perfectly inside. The liner has a top that closes and protects from street dirt and dust as you travel. If you are a city dweller or just want to free your arms from packages, this item is definitely for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy  Soul

customer_reviews.title: I love the cart!
customer_reviews.text: This product came wrapped well. It was easy to put together. I took into account some reviews that talked about how hard the wheels were to put on, but found them very easy, even the pins. Over all I am very happy with this product. There is one note. The instructions are not very clear on this. The straight pins that go on last on the big wheels, The pin goes through the cap and the mandrel, then you wrap the extended pin around the cap, there is a groove, and it secures it. The picture does not well define this. Other wise it was very easy to put together. I am very happy with this cart!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McCallum

customer_reviews.title: The only possible problem with this is that it won't ...
customer_reviews.text: The only possible problem with this is that it won't sit in my car with the groceries in it. It is bigger than I thought. It will fit in the trunk (folded down) of my Honda Accord however. I use this all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Linda E Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Assembly difficult but possible.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble. Chinenglish instructions hard to understand. Needs to be written by someone with English as their PRIMARY language. Almost identical parts need to be labeled, especially the axles. Pictures too small and NOT informative. Several steps of assembly COMPLETELY left out! Excellent cart once you get there. Took at least 30 minutes longer than it should have. Ought to sue for frostbite assembling outside in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: aplpickr

customer_reviews.title: Great for shopping
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I needed it for but way to heavy for me to transport from car to my Condo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Produce
customer_reviews.text: The hook on the back allows for easy attachment to a shooping cart, it folds up making it a space saver & very portable. Very sturdy cart I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Handy Tote
customer_reviews.text: The cart that I recently purchased was a great value and is invaluable for me since I am disabled. It was very easy to assemble. I use my cart to transport everything from groceries to potting soil, and sidewalk salt to flower and vegetable plants. It is extra sturdy for the jobs I do, too. I love it and it makes my life a whole lot easier. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Nico

customer_reviews.title: Beach Helper
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cart to use at the beach, to carry all the equipment, toys, towels, and chairs. It was awesome! Sturdy with big wheels that moved easily across the sand. Folds flat so easy to transport in the car. Sturdy bottom. Would buy again. Perfect for any outdoor activity use.
customer_reviews.author: Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: this is great for getting around for groceries and
customer_reviews.text: do not own a car, this is great for getting around for groceries and errands
customer_reviews.author: pamela wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: This cart is functional but not very sturdy. It is easy to assemble. I have had it for a couple of months now and it still smells horrible! It was smelling up my storage closet so badly I finally put it in the garage.makes me wonder how toxic it is.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Aasen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy & has large capacity
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy & has large capacity. It is heavy if you have to lift it and not easy to turn corners.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria P

customer_reviews.title: Looked solid
customer_reviews.text: It looked sturdy but unfortunately it was received with only 3 wheels so I couldnt put together. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: It's very handy for carrying groceries from car to house ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very handy for carrying groceries from car to house, but hard to reach down into basket.to wither load or lift items out
customer_reviews.author: P. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Good cart, sturdy and tall enough that I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Good cart, sturdy and tall enough that I don't have to stoop when pushing it. There were some missing pieces ( the box was damaged in transit) 123Stores was very prompt in making sure I had the parts in good time
customer_reviews.author: beaglelover

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this cart about 14 to 16 city blocks round trip to differant stores.Over brocken side walks,frozen,snow coverd side walks and low and high curbs with cases of bottle water,gallons of milk,bleach,cases of can goods.I bought this cart about 2 months ago and shows no signs of wear and tear. I highly recomened this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Merle E. DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Super Shopping Cart, ease of assembly
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of a comment by at least one person, that the wheels fall off. I have complete faith they won't fall off the one I have. Some people don't have the skills to even assemble simple items. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Norman Webb.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, sturdy and rugged. Carries quite a heavy load.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reader

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THR BEST ITEM I HAVE EVER PURCHASED
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THR BEST ITEM I HAVE EVER PURCHASED. I CAN TAKE ALL MY GROCERIES IN THE HOUSE IN ONE TRIP,. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: joan marchio

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart for my mom as I wanted to be confidant it would not break down while she was out. Was originally sent the wrong cart, but they sent a new one right away.
customer_reviews.author: Rnagle

customer_reviews.title: needs front wheels that swivel.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the front wheels need to swivel. It is quite large and holds a lot of laundry, groceries, etc. It maneuvers much easier than a shopping cart.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a walk to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.text: This cart serves very well the purpose to carry the groceries back home. It makes the walk back home easier with the load of groceries. I sent it to a person and it was a great relief for her.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: After 20 years of constant use, I had to replace it!
customer_reviews.text: This is just like my old one. I look forward to 20 more good years. Easy to put wheels on.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Loved this cart
customer_reviews.text: Loved this cart. It was very strong and lasted a long time! Plan to buy another now that it finally died.
customer_reviews.author: Cincy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cart to use for neighborhood shopping and the laundromat. It has done all I have asked of it very well. It can carry a large load, manuvers easily and handles rough sidewalks. I definitely recommend it for anyone with similar needs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Claussen

customer_reviews.title: ... no car and quite the bus commute this is great. With the reinforced bottom
customer_reviews.text: With no car and quite the bus commute this is great. With the reinforced bottom, 3 cases of water is no problem for our buggy
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: My Opinion Of My Blue Shopping Cart
customer_reviews.text: I really like the deep teal blue color. I haven't been able to put it together because the one small wheel's rubber is warped on one side and is therefore considered defective for installing with the rest of the cart. Since it cannot be repaired, do I still need to send it back? If so, I'll need to have you send me a POSTAGE-FREE label. If not, how long will it take to receive a replacement wheel?
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: SUPER  CART
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because it holds alot more groceries than the normal shopping carts.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: one of the best purchases i made
customer_reviews.text: it is the best shopping cart to buy it is heavy and very sturdy and it holds a lot it is heavy since it weighs 25 pounds empty but i LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Good help!
customer_reviews.text: I like the cart very much except for one thing: the wheels do not turn so you have to lift it slightly in order to turn, which is very inconvenient. Still, it is sturdy and carries a lot. I use for groceries, taking out the trash, etc. I had to have someone else put it together for me as the instructions were somewhat confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Edrie Womack

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Use only for light groceries. Not good for heavy loads. I placed several grocery bags and it was wobbly and not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Cart
customer_reviews.text: The cart is nice except that I ordered a red one and received a black one. I needed a cart so did not return it... Would not purchase from this site again
customer_reviews.author: Helen Martin

customer_reviews.title: shopping cart
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shopping cart through amazon. When I was looking at the parts shipped with it, I found out I was shorted the front axel. I called the company and they were to order the part for me. After waiting two weeks, I called again and I was told that the part was delayed as the paperwork was missing. It was reordered and shipped by UPS. I received it and was able to finish the project of putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

product_meta.title: Easy Wheels Super Shopping Cart, Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedThis exceptionally high quality four wheel Super Shopping Cart is ideal for shopping, laundry and hundreds of other purposes. The cart holds up to 250-pound and is coated with a highly durable epoxy finish.
feature_bullets: Made of heavy gauge steel with plate at bottom of basket for added support - 250-pound weight capacity
Hardened plastic wheels. folds flat for easy storage
